channel.title: SoCap08 on Lewwwk
channel.description: Recent content in SoCap08 on Lewwwk

item.title: SoCap08 – Alive online
item.description:
::::: entry-content ::: thumbnail {.alignright decoding=“async” fetchpriority=“high” height=“218” width=“380”}[]{style=“font-size: 10px; font-family: Lucida Grande,Trebuchet,sans-serif,Helvetica,Arial; color: #808080;"}My first impression of SoCap08 have as much to do with the excellence of the physical event as they do with the virtualization of it. :::

First the physical event. There are over 600 participants from the usual people but also from more mainstream financial players that are seriously starting to get their toes wet. I first heard about this a year ago when Kevin Jones of GoodCapital was just starting to pull it together and I must say they did an extraordinary job of convening the community in a big way.

item.title: Building Blocks for a new kind of Venture Capital
item.description:
::::: entry-content ::: {.zemanta-img .zemanta-action-click}

:::

A new kind of venture capital for purposeful ventures is something I’ve been exploring for a number of years and was recently reenergized by some conversations at the OpenEverything retreat in September. I’m writing this now as I head to SoCap08 and looking forward to testing some of these ideas against other emerging models (e.g. Enterpreneur Commons) and amongst the worlds leaders in social venture investment. I’ll follow-up this post with any big insights that emerge and in the meantime I’m interested in any comments about what I’ve started framing below. Feel free to contribute in the comments or email me directly. And of course if you are buliding another model – feel free to take anything you gain from this and use or remix freely – just ping me and let me know what you are working on and share alike.

item.title: SoCap08 – Social Capital Markets Conference
item.description:
:::: entry-content I’m getting ready to head to SoCap08 in San Francisco{.zem_slink rel=“geolocation”}. Here’s a brief blurb on what it’s about – and for those of you who are interested there is a twitter account and tag that you can follow.

Doing well and doing good is the mantra of a new generation of entrepreneurs and the organizations that invest in them. And Social Capital Markets 2008 (SoCap08) is a new event designed to bring together all of the people and organizations with a similar deep passion to change the world through sustainable businesses.
